trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> .

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> é retornado a partir de <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.FindUsersByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.FindUsersByEmail%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership?displayProperty=nameWithType> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> objects returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods contain a snapshot of user information in the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> objetos retornados pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.FindUsersByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.FindUsersByEmail%2A> métodos contêm um instantâneo de informações de usuário no repositório de dados de associação.

trans-unit.source: That is, changes to the membership user information in a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> are not reflected in the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, altera as informações de usuário de associação em um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> não são refletidas no armazenamento de dados de associação.

trans-unit.source: To modify membership user information in the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.CreateUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.DeleteUser%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar informações de usuário de associação no repositório de associação de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.CreateUser%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.DeleteUser%2A> métodos de <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership?displayProperty=nameWithType> classe.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: Se você não estiver familiarizado com os recursos de associação do ASP.NET, consulte [Introdução a associação](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) antes de continuar.

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de outros tópicos relacionados a associação, consulte [Gerenciando usuários com o uso de associações](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd).

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns a list of membership users with a count of the number of users currently online.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir retorna uma lista de usuários da associação com uma contagem do número de usuários online no momento.

trans-unit.source: For an example of an ASP.NET application configured to use membership, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um aplicativo ASP.NET configurado para usar a associação, consulte o <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new, empty membership user collection.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova coleção de usuário associado vazia.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> is constructed by membership provider implementers and returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> é construído por implementadores de provedor de associação e retornado do <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> classe abstrata.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a sample <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> implementation.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra um exemplo <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> implementação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified membership user to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o usuário associado especificado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.Add%2A> method is commonly used by membership provider implementations of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.Add%2A> método é normalmente usado por implementações do provedor de associação do <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> classe abstrata.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a sample <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> implementation.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra um exemplo <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> implementação.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A coleção é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> of the <paramref name="user" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> do <paramref name="user" /> é nulo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> object with the same <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> value as <paramref name="user" /> already exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> com o mesmo valor de <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> que <paramref name="user" /> já existe na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes all membership user objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os objetos do usuário associado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example clears a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> before replacing it with the results of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GetAllUsers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo limpa um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> antes de substituí-lo com os resultados do <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GetAllUsers%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> que é o destino dos elementos copiados da <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A matriz deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero na matriz em que a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the membership user collection to a one-dimensional array.
trans-unit.target: Copia a coleção de usuário associado para uma matriz unidimensional.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of membership user objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de objetos do usuário associado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists all of the users from the membership user data source, including a count of the total number of users.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir lista todos os usuários da fonte de dados de usuário associação, incluindo uma contagem do número total de usuários.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the membership user collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um enumerador que pode iterar pela coleção de usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the entire <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> para todo o <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeradores permitem apenas ler os dados na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeradores não podem ser usados para modificar a coleção subjacente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to iterate through a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> retornado do <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> método para iterar por meio de um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the membership user collection is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção de usuário associado é thread safe.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="false" /> because thread-safe membership user collections are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="false" /> porque não há suporte para coleções de usuário de associação de thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Application code does not normally use this property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o código do aplicativo não usa essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName" /> do <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> a ser recuperado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the membership user in the collection referenced by the specified user name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o usuário associado da coleção referenciada pelo nome de usuário especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> object representing the user specified by <paramref name="name" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> objeto que representa o usuário especificado por <paramref name="name" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> object returned by <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.Item%2A> property contains a snapshot of user information in the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> objeto retornado por <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.Item%2A> propriedade contém um instantâneo de informações de usuário no repositório de dados de associação.

trans-unit.source: That is, changes to the membership user information in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> are not reflected in the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, altera as informações de usuário de associação no <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> não são refletidas no armazenamento de dados de associação.

trans-unit.source: To modify membership user information in the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.CreateUser%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.DeleteUser%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar informações de usuário de associação no repositório de associação de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.CreateUser%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.DeleteUser%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays all membership user names in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> and shows specific membership information for the selected user name.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir exibe todos os nomes de usuário de associação em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> e mostra informações de associação específico para o nome de usuário selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The user name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the membership user object with the specified user name from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o objeto do usuário associado com o nome de usuário especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A coleção é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Makes the contents of the membership user collection read-only.
trans-unit.target: Torna o conteúdo da coleção de usuário associado somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> are considered read-only, as they are a snapshot of the membership user information in the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo de um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> são considerados somente leitura, como eles são um instantâneo das informações de usuário de associação no repositório de dados de associação.

trans-unit.source: Membership user information is modified using the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.CreateUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.DeleteUser%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Informações de usuário de associação são modificadas usando o <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.CreateUser%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.DeleteUser%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.SetReadOnly%2A> method marks the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> as read-only so that <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> objects cannot be added to or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.SetReadOnly%2A> método marcas a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> como somente leitura para que <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> objetos não podem ser adicionados ou removidos da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Property values for the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> objects are not marked as read-only.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedades para o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> objetos não são marcados como somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: That is, you can modify the property values of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> regardless of whether the collection has been marked as read-only by the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.SetReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ou seja, você pode modificar os valores de propriedade de um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> no <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> independentemente se a coleção foi marcada como somente leitura, o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection.SetReadOnly%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns all of the users from the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir retorna todos os usuários do armazenamento de dados de associação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned is marked as read-only based on a `Boolean` parameter specified by the caller.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> retornado está marcado como somente leitura com base em um `Boolean` parâmetro especificado pelo chamador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the synchronization root.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a raiz de sincronização.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="this" />, because synchronization of membership user collections is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="this" />, porque não há suporte para a sincronização de coleções de usuário de associação.

trans-unit.source: Application code does not normally use this property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o código do aplicativo não usa essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination for the objects copied from the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional que é o destino dos objetos copiados do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Array" /> deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero na <c>array</c> na qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> object to an <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at a particular <see cref="T:System.Array" /> index.
trans-unit.target: Copia o conteúdo do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> para um <see cref="T:System.Array" />, começando em um índice <see cref="T:System.Array" /> determinado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than or equal to the length of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é maior que ou igual ao comprimento da <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos no <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> de origem é maior que o espaço disponível de <paramref name="index" /> até o final do matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> de origem não pode ser convertido automaticamente no tipo da matriz de destino.
